artists.name: McHorse
artists.specialty: BBS mod creator / Minecraft machinima filmmaker
artists.notes: McHorse is the developer of BBS mod — the core tool Steven's Crowd Spawner mod extends. Steven built crowd-spawner-v3.0 as a community mod FOR McHorse's ecosystem. This is an ideal collab: (1) McHorse could spotlight Steven's mod to his BBS community (2) Steven could get featured on McHorse's YouTube showcasing the crowd spawner (3) Joint content opportunity for Minecraft Movie recreation. Contact via YouTube community or BBS Discord.
artists.collabAngle: Steven built an extension mod for McHorse's tool — natural reason to reach out. Offer to showcase the mod in a joint video.

artists.name: BBS Mod Community
artists.notes: Active community of Minecraft machinima filmmakers using BBS mod. Steven's Crowd Spawner mod is directly useful to all of them. Share mod in Discord for organic community growth + potential collab creators.
artists.collabAngle: Post crowd-spawner-v3.0 in the BBS Discord mod-sharing channel. Instant relevant audience.

outreachTemplates.initialContact: Hi [Name], I'm looking for a Minecraft builder for a YouTube video project. I need a custom map featuring [brief description]. Budget is around $[amount]. Timeline is [timeframe]. Are you available?
outreachTemplates.iceDragonSpecific: Hi [Name], I'm producing a YouTube video about an Ice Dragon in Minecraft and need a custom snowy/ice biome map with a dragon lair. The map should support cinematic shots. Budget is $100-200 depending on complexity. Timeline is 1 week. Interested?

blockers.issue: Requires LOGIN to contact sellers - human verification wall

blockers.workaround: Create account or use Discord contacts where available
